name: Sister Pages
author: David Schkiwisk, Johann Roche

sections.description:
Sister Pages was created to help Webmasters to improve their SEO.

This extension contain :
– a shortcode to display Sister Pages
– an Elementor Widget to display Sister Pages

About us

  • David SEO – SEO Consultant at CapsuleWeb.fr
  • Johann ROCHE – Webmaster / Developer

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Pages > Add New
  4. Press the ‘Edit with Elementor’ button.
    5a. Now you can drag and drop Sister page widgets from the left panel onto the content area, as well as add new sections and columns that make up the page structure.
    5b. You can use the shortcode [sister_pages] as well everywhere on you dear wordpress .
sections.faq:
How to use the shortcode sister_pages ?

Simply like this : [sister_pages]
Or like this if you want to exclude page [sister_pages exclude=”8,9″]
Or like this if you want to add a title [sister_pages exclude=”8,9″ title=”Youpi lala SEO” hn=”h4″]

Where is the widget Sister page in Elementor ?

In the General TAB

  • Display nothing if there is no sisterpage

1.0.1
